# ns_npa_private_apps_list (Data Source)

NPAPrivateAppsList DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ns_npa_private_apps_list" "my_npaprivateappslist" {
  limit  = 1
  offset = 2
  query  = "...my_query..."
}
```
